turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I ordered a pair of running shoes last week and the tracking information hasn't updated in three days. It still says 'Label Created'. What's going on? This is really frustrating; I need these shoes for a race!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let me look into that order for you. Could you please provide your order number or the email address associated with the order?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, the order number is #2349876. Also, I was wondering, if they are really lost, can I get overnight shipping on the replacement pair? I paid for standard shipping originally, but I need to make sure I get them before my race on Saturday. Otherwise, what is your policy if the shipment is truly lost? Do I just get a refund?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I've checked order #2349876. It appears there's a slight delay with the shipping carrier. I've contacted them to investigate and expedite the tracking. As for overnight shipping on a replacement, I can't guarantee it at this stage, but I will add a note to the order. If the shoes are confirmed lost, we typically offer a full refund or a replacement shipped with expedited service at no extra cost to you. I'll update you within 24 hours regarding the carrier's investigation. Is there anything else I can help you with at the moment?
